mode.name: system_probes
mode.query: SELECT P.recid AS ID, P.probe_type, P.customer_id AS ORG_ID, C.group_name AS COMMAND_GROUP_NAME, C.name AS COMMAND_NAME, P.notify_critical, P.notify_warning, P.notify_unknown, P.notify_recovery, P.notification_interval_minutes, P.check_interval_minutes, P.retry_interval_minutes, P.max_attempts, P.last_update_date, P.description, PS.state AS PROBE_STATE, PS.output FROM rhn_sat_cluster SC, rhn_command C, rhn_check_probe CP, rhn_probe P LEFT JOIN rhn_probe_state PS ON PS.probe_id = P.recid WHERE CP.host_id = :sid AND CP.probe_id = P.recid AND CP.sat_cluster_id = SC.recid AND P.command_id = C.recid ORDER BY UPPER(PS.state)

mode.name: probe_state
mode.query: SELECT probe_id, scout_id, state, output, TO_CHAR(last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhn_probe_state WHERE probe_id = :probe_id

mode.name: probe
mode.query: SELECT probe_type, description, customer_id, command_id, contact_group_id, notify_critical, notify_warning, notify_unknown, notify_recovery, notification_interval_minutes, check_interval_minutes, retry_interval_minutes, max_attempts, last_update_user, last_update_date FROM rhn_probe WHERE recid = :probe_id

mode.name: probes_for_contact_method
mode.query: SELECT CP.host_id system_id, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, S.name AS SYSTEM_NAME FROM rhnServer S, rhn_check_probe CP, rhn_probe P, rhn_contact_group_members CGM WHERE CP.probe_id = P.recid AND P.contact_group_id = CGM.contact_group_id AND CGM.member_contact_method_id = :method_id AND S.id = CP.host_id ORDER BY S.name, S.id, P.description, P.recid

mode.name: ok_system_probes
mode.query: SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from rhn_check_probe where probe_id = P.recid) AND customer_id = :org_id AND P.probe_type = 'check' AND PS.state = 'OK' AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = S.id ORDER BY system_name, probe_description

mode.name: warning_system_probes
mode.query: SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from rhn_check_probe where probe_id = P.recid) AND customer_id = :org_id AND P.probe_type = 'check' AND PS.state = 'WARNING' AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = S.id ORDER BY system_name, probe_description

mode.name: critical_system_probes
mode.query: SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from rhn_check_probe where probe_id = P.recid) AND customer_id = :org_id AND P.probe_type = 'check' AND PS.state = 'CRITICAL' AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = S.id ORDER BY system_name, probe_description

mode.name: unknown_system_probes
mode.query: SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from rhn_check_probe where probe_id = P.recid) AND customer_id = :org_id AND P.probe_type = 'check' AND PS.state = 'UNKNOWN' AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = S.id ORDER BY system_name, probe_description

mode.name: pending_system_probes
mode.query: SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from rhn_check_probe where probe_id = P.recid) AND customer_id = :org_id AND P.probe_type = 'check' AND PS.state = 'PENDING' AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = S.id ORDER BY system_name, probe_description

mode.name: all_system_probes
mode.query: SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from rhn_check_probe where probe_id = P.recid) AND customer_id = :org_id AND P.probe_type = 'check' AND USP.user_id = :user_id AND USP.server_id = S.id ORDER BY system_name, probe_description

mode.name: system_groups_probes
mode.query:
SELECT S.id system_id, S.name system_name, P.recid probe_id, P.description probe_description, PS.state probe_state, PS.output probe_output, TO_CHAR(PS.last_check, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_CHECK FROM rhnServer S, rhn_probe P, rhn_probe_state PS WHERE P.recid = PS.probe_id AND S.id = (SELECT host_id from rhn_check_probe where probe_id = P.recid)
AND exists (SELECT 1 from rhnServerGroupMembership SGM WHERE SGM.server_id = s.ID AND SGM.group_id = :group_id)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.id AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping') AND P.probe_type = 'check' ORDER BY system_name, probe_description
